VEvil.​ICE.​AICEVirtualCamera
MonoBehaviour
public abstract
VEvil.​ICE.​AICEVirtualCamera
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Cameras.​Gameplay.​GameCamera

AICEVirtualCamera allows a CinemachineVirtualCamera to be registered within the system managing them, the ICESystem.

There are different methods for classes inheriting from a AICEVirtualCamera, which want to use MonoBehaviour's methods such as "Start", "Update", ...  See the virtual methods of this class for more details.

public string Name {

}

The name of this AICEVirtualCamera.

Functions
Awake
private void Awake()
OnDestroy
private void OnDestroy()
Start
private void Start()
OnEnable
private void OnEnable()
OnDisable
private void OnDisable()
Update
private void Update()
FixedUpdate
private void FixedUpdate()
LateUpdate
private void LateUpdate()
OnAwakeCamera
private protected virtual void OnAwakeCamera()

OnAwakeCamera is called when an enabled script instance is being loaded.

OnStartCamera
private protected virtual void OnStartCamera()

OnStartCamera is called on the frame when a script is enabled just before any of the Update methods are called for the first frame.

OnEnableCamera
private protected virtual void OnEnableCamera()

OnEnableCamera is called when the object becomes enabled and active.

OnDisableCamera
private protected virtual void OnDisableCamera()

OnDisableCamera is called when the behaviour becomes disabled.

OnDestroyCamera
private protected virtual void OnDestroyCamera()

Destroying the attached Behaviour will result in the game or Scene receiving OnDestroy.

OnUpdateCamera
private protected virtual void OnUpdateCamera()

OnUpdateCamera is called every frames.

OnFixedUpdateCamera
private protected virtual void OnFixedUpdateCamera()

Frame-rate independent MonoBehaviour.FixedUpdate message for physics calculations.

OnLateUpdateCamera
private protected virtual void OnLateUpdateCamera()

OnLateUpdateCamera is called every frame, if the Behaviour is enabled.

OnVirtualCameraShowed
public virtual void OnVirtualCameraShowed()

OnVirtualCameraShowed is called when this AICEVirtualCamera is the main camera.

Must be called by the ICESystem!

OnVirtualCameraHidden
public virtual void OnVirtualCameraHidden()

OnVirtualCameraHidden is called when the this AICEVirtualCamera is no longer the main camera.

Must be called by the ICESystem!
